title: Gold 3 Support/top laner Looking for an ool team
body:
Hey guys im a gold 3 support main with a bit of experience with tank top laners like  galio,maokai and poppy 
But i am more accustomed to the support role with my main supports being along the line of braum, karma, lulu and to a lesser extent most other supports
If anybody needed a support for their team contact me at this thread 
Thanks to any responders

-Ghost

replies.body: If you would like, come and join our team and support me! P4 adc main and looking for an experienced support such as yourself, join our team via this link -  https://go.battlefy.com/pWFuDd2Ib9Ff and our discord - https://discord.gg/hK9wtT
